column4: morning everyone, today I finally square away my video, hopefully with your help. :) How would I make ubuntu fully recognize my video card?
what version of ubuntu are you using
go to system > administration > restricted driver manager
i see an ati driver that is not in use
do you have an ati card
damn this color sceme, there's a checkbox that i cant see, but know where it should be and i clicked it, hold on
still downloading my newcard still dosent work fully
was thanking you for the help anyway
that's a great metaphor about snow flakes

i usta play armored core, the game has 64000 parts give or take, and i usta say mechs are like snowflakes as a result, and then i realized computers have far more than 64000 so the same must apply, thank you :)
ok the drivers are in use but now i cant drag around windows, shrink them, alt tab, etc
and the irc windows covers everything so whatever you tell me to do i'll have to leave to do it.
